## CapabilitiesSetup.registerCapabilitiesProvider() method

Register a  to be used when resolving capabilities.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerCapabilitiesProvider(provider: CapabilitiesProvider): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  provider | <code>CapabilitiesProvider</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Example


```ts
// my-plugin/server/plugin.ts
public setup(core: CoreSetup, deps: {}) {
   core.capabilities.registerCapabilitiesProvider(() => {
     return {
       catalogue: {
         myPlugin: true,
       },
       myPlugin: {
         feature: true,
       },
     }
   })
}

```
